input_text: Calculate the distance from multiline '<id_2153>' to multiline '<id_1934>'
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id, t2.id, ST_Distance(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography) AS distance_m FROM table_multiline t1, table_multiline t2 WHERE t1.id = '<id_2153>' AND t2.id = '<id_1934>';

input_text: Is multipoint '<id_1257>' inside line '<id_2583>'?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_line t1, table_multipoint t2 WHERE ST_Contains(t1.geom, t2.geom) AND t1.id = '<id_2583>' AND t2.id = '<id_1257>';

input_text: What's the gap between point '<id_8886>' and point '<id_1004>'?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id, t2.id, ST_Distance(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography) AS distance_m FROM table_point t1, table_point t2 WHERE t1.id = '<id_8886>' AND t2.id = '<id_1004>';

input_text: Do polygon '<id_7681>' and multipolygon '<id_1392>' intersect?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_polygon t1, table_multipolygon t2 WHERE ST_Intersects(t1.geom, t2.geom) AND t1.id = '<id_7681>' AND t2.id = '<id_1392>';

input_text: List multipoints that have attr_boolean != False
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_multipoint WHERE attr_boolean != False;

input_text: Find polygons where attr_text not in 'type_b', 'status_active', 'type_a'
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_polygon WHERE attr_text NOT IN ('type_b', 'status_active', 'type_a');

input_text: Show points with attr_date = '2022-01-01'
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_point WHERE attr_date = '2022-01-01';

input_text: Do point '<id_7764>' and polygon '<id_9325>' cross each other?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_point t1, table_polygon t2 WHERE ST_Intersects(t1.geom, t2.geom) AND t1.id = '<id_7764>' AND t2.id = '<id_9325>';

input_text: Find multipoints where attr_date = '2022-01-01' within 500m of multiline '<id_3638>'
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_multipoint t1, table_multiline t2 WHERE attr_date = '2022-01-01' AND ST_DWithin(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography, 500) AND t2.id = '<id_3638>';

input_text: Find points that are NOT within 2000m of any line
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_point WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM table_line WHERE ST_DWithin(table_point.geom::geography, table_line.geom::geography, 2000));

input_text: Which lines have attr_boolean = True and are within 100m of multipoint '<id_8673>'?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_line t1, table_multipoint t2 WHERE attr_boolean = True AND ST_DWithin(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography, 100) AND t2.id = '<id_8673>';

input_text: What is the 100m service area around multiline '<id_5645>'?
spatial_sql: SELECT id, ST_Buffer(geom::geography, 100)::geometry AS buffer_geom FROM table_multiline WHERE id = '<id_5645>';

input_text: Calculate line density for each polygon
spatial_sql: SELECT t2.id, COUNT(t1.id) AS table_line_count FROM table_polygon t2 LEFT JOIN table_line t1 ON ST_Within(t1.geom, t2.geom) GROUP BY t2.id;

input_text: Display lines that are far from all polygons
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_line WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM table_polygon WHERE ST_DWithin(table_line.geom::geography, table_polygon.geom::geography, 1000));

input_text: Show points with attr_text not in 'type_c', 'type_a', 'category_2' near multipoint '<id_6320>' (within 2000m)
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_point t1, table_multipoint t2 WHERE attr_text NOT IN ('type_c', 'type_a', 'category_2') AND ST_DWithin(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography, 2000) AND t2.id = '<id_6320>';

input_text: What's the distance along multiline '<id_1389>'?
spatial_sql: SELECT id, ST_Length(geom::geography) AS length_m FROM table_multiline WHERE id = '<id_1389>';

input_text: Calculate density of points with attr_text != 'category_1' per polygon
spatial_sql: SELECT t2.id, COUNT(t1.id) AS filtered_count FROM table_polygon t2 LEFT JOIN table_point t1 ON ST_Within(t1.geom, t2.geom) AND attr_text != 'category_1' GROUP BY t2.id;

input_text: Do multipolygon '<id_7223>' and multipolygon '<id_6286>' cross each other?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_multipolygon t1, table_multipolygon t2 WHERE ST_Intersects(t1.geom, t2.geom) AND t1.id = '<id_7223>' AND t2.id = '<id_6286>';

input_text: Show multipoints that don't have any multipolygon within 1000 meters
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_multipoint WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM table_multipolygon WHERE ST_DWithin(table_multipoint.geom::geography, table_multipolygon.geom::geography, 1000));

input_text: Find the centroid of multipoint '<id_9628>'
spatial_sql: SELECT id, ST_Centroid(geom) AS centroid FROM table_multipoint WHERE id = '<id_9628>';

input_text: Show polygons with attr_text not in 'status_inactive', 'category_1', 'category_2' near multipoint '<id_1061>' (within 500m)
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_polygon t1, table_multipoint t2 WHERE attr_text NOT IN ('status_inactive', 'category_1', 'category_2') AND ST_DWithin(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography, 500) AND t2.id = '<id_1061>';

input_text: Are polygon '<id_8634>' and multipoint '<id_4517>' less than 500m apart?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_polygon t1, table_multipoint t2 WHERE ST_DWithin(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography, 500) AND t1.id = '<id_8634>' AND t2.id = '<id_4517>';

input_text: Which points have attr_boolean = True and are within 1000m of multiline '<id_9226>'?
spatial_sql: SELECT t1.id FROM table_point t1, table_multiline t2 WHERE attr_boolean = True AND ST_DWithin(t1.geom::geography, t2.geom::geography, 1000) AND t2.id = '<id_9226>';

input_text: Calculate line density for each polygon
spatial_sql: SELECT t2.id, COUNT(t1.id) AS table_line_count FROM table_polygon t2 LEFT JOIN table_line t1 ON ST_Within(t1.geom, t2.geom) GROUP BY t2.id;

input_text: Show the 2000m radius around multiline '<id_5334>'
spatial_sql: SELECT id, ST_Buffer(geom::geography, 2000)::geometry AS buffer_geom FROM table_multiline WHERE id = '<id_5334>';

input_text: Find points where attr_boolean != True
spatial_sql: SELECT id FROM table_point WHERE attr_boolean != True;
